name: NS AdBlock Blocker
author: NsThemes

sections.description:
NS AdBlock Blocker helps you to detect site visitors who have installed and activated adBlocking extensions.
You can require users to turn off their ad blocker before allowing them into the site.
Substantially this plugin, if adBlock is activated, redirect users into blocked page.

OTHER FEATURES

  • Default page fully customizable
  • Use your custom page

TESTED ON

  • Google Chrome
  • Mozilla Firefox
  • Internet Explorer (8+)
  • Safari
  • Opera

With many adBlocker type. If you find incompatibility with one specific adBlocker or browser version, please inform us at report@nsthemes.com.

PREMIUM FEATURES

  • Choose where display message (page, modal, sticky bar)
  • Modal fully customizable.
  • Choose Modal header text, color and background color.
  • Choose Modal body text, font-awesome, color and background color.
  • Choose sticky bar text.
  • Choose sticky bar color.

See more info about premium version at NsThemes Store.

We test our plugins with many other. If you find incompatibility with one specific plugin, please inform us at report@nsthemes.com.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘ns-adblock-blocker’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. View admin menu, then click on ‘Ad Block Blocker’
sections.faq:
Code is required to use this plugin?

No code required to use this plugin.

Is this plugin compatible with WooCommerce?

Yes, this plugin is WooCommerce compatible but not required.

I found an incompatibility, what i can do?

Please, create new topic in NS AdBlock Blocker support section. We will reply as soon as possible.

short_description: Allows you to lock site display to users with ad Blockers installed and increase your earns.
